game.name: Animals Memory: Cats
game.shortDescription: Animals Memory: Cats is a card game with pictures of different cats that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards
game.shortDescriptionEn: Animals Memory: Cats is a card game with pictures of different cats that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards

reviewHighlights.text: ** Game finished ** I would like it more if there was not a limit with the errors. I would like it, with no error limits and gradually more icons. 4/1...
Animals Memory: Cats is a simple, gentle, and deliberately uncomplicated puzzle game built around the classic card-matching formula, but presented wit...
